svg.text: McCzarny recently pushed multiple updates to
his ghsummary repository, a Go application for
summarizing GitHub user activity. He
implemented support for specifying user
pronouns in the generated summaries, modifying
`README.md`, `action.yml`, and Go source files.
He also focused on improving the underlying AI
model for summary generation, updating it to
use the Gemini 2.5 preview model. Subsequently,
he moved to the
"gemini-2.5-flash-preview-05-20" model.
Throughout these updates, he refined the system
prompt for the Gemini API, aiming for increased
brevity, conciseness, and accuracy in the
output. These changes ensure the project
generates plain text suitable for SVG elements.
He also updated an example SVG output to
reflect more detailed summaries, including work
on other projects like upload-image and
black-fat-cat.
Generated on: Sun Jul 6 02:07:09 2025
